item.description: The manager of Back Bay Social Club offered to host one of our thirsty evenings with some designated space and free appetizers.   They could only accommodate us on Thursday rather than Friday night, so I have changed to date of the event to Thursday March 3rd.
item.why: I recently went to the Back Bay Social Club for the first time, seems like a great venue for an Aussie meetup. For something a bit different this will be a joint event with the Boston Brits. They're a fun group so it should be a great night.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Thirsty First Thursday at the Back Bay Social Club
